title: Apple releases iOS 15.5 beta 4 to registered developers, here’s what’s new
content:
After the introduction of iOS 15.4 in March, Apple is now working on the upcoming version of iOS 15. The company has just released iOS 15.5 beta 4 to registered developers worldwide. iOS 15.5 could possibly be the last major update to iOS 15 — as the company has announced WWDC22. As a result, Apple is

The post Apple releases iOS 15.5 beta 4 to registered developers, here’s what’s new appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple has seeded iOS 15.5 beta 4 to developers around the world. Here's everything new included in this updated version.
